ARABIC: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I am the slave of Allah, He has given me the Book and made me a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I am a servant of God," he answered. "He has given me a Book and made me a prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The child cried out: "Verily I am Allah's servant. He has granted me the Book and has made me a Prophet
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "I am the servant of God. He has given me the Book and has appointed me to be a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The child proclaimed, “I am Allah’s bondman; He has given me the Book and made me a Herald of the Hidden (a Prophet).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Verily, I am a servant of Allah, He has given me the Scripture and made me a Prophet;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Surely I am a servant of Allah; He has given me the Book and made me a prophet;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Lo, I am God's servant; God has given me the Book, and made me a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He spake: Lo! I am the slave of Allah. He hath given me the Scripture and hath appointed me a Prophet,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [But] he said, "I am God's servant. He has given me the Book and made me a prophet;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He Said: verily I am a bondman of Allah; He hath vouchsafed me the Book and made me a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Indeed I am a servant of Allah! He has given me the Book and made me a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "I am indeed a servant of Allah: He hath given me revelation and made me a prophet;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He ['Iesa (Jesus)] said: Verily! I am a slave of Allah, He has given me the Scripture and made me a Prophet;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (the baby) said: 'I am the worshiper of Allah. Allah has given me the Book and made me a Prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I am the servant of God. He has given me the Scripture, and made me a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Jesus] said, "Indeed, I am the servant of Allah. He has given me the Scripture and made me a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:30] He said, ‘Lo! I am God’s servant. He has given me the Scripture, namely, the Gospel, and made me a prophet.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Jesus then spoke to them, (He spake: Lo! I am the slave of Allah. He hath given me the Scripture) He taught me the Torah and the Gospel while still in my mother's womb (and hath appointed me a Prophet) after my mother delivered me, 328
